executive-summary.one-liner: Daily check-in game for Solana Seeker where missing one day means losing everything
executive-summary.problem: Seeker users need organic daily transactions for SKR Wave 2 farming but have no fun reason to transact
executive-summary.solution-vision: Gamify daily transactions with real stakes - stake SOL, check in daily to grow, miss once and lose it all
executive-summary.success-metric: 10,000 active users generating 6-10 organic transactions daily
executive-summary.timeline: 3 days to launch on Seeker dApp Store

problem-statement.description: SKR Wave 1 distributed only 20% of supply based on on-chain activity tiers. Wave 2 is coming with another 10%+ allocation. Seeker users are ranked by transaction volume and activity. Currently users resort to wash trading or forcing themselves to use random apps with no intrinsic motivation.
problem-statement.root-cause: No engaging reason to transact daily on Seeker - activity feels like a chore rather than entertainment
problem-statement.impact: Users either game the system poorly (wash trading) or miss out on significant SKR allocations worth thousands of dollars
problem-statement.urgency: Seeker Season 2 is live NOW. Wave 2 timing unknown but activity is being tracked. Every day without organic transactions is lost farming potential.

current-state.existing-solution: Wash trading between own wallets, forcing usage of random dApps, or simply not farming optimally

pain-points.pain: Wash trading feels pointless and may not count for rankings
Using random apps provides no entertainment value
No social element to make farming fun
Easy to forget to transact daily

current-state.what-works: Users already have Seed Vault habit - fingerprint to confirm is natural

features-raw.note: Raw features from interview. genius-specs will formalize into user stories.

feature.name: Stake to Enter
feature.description: User stakes SOL (0.05 minimum) to join the game. Slider UI to pick amount, default at minimum.
feature.user-value: Simple entry point with choice of risk level
feature.business-value: Creates pool for redistribution, enables all game mechanics

feature.name: Daily Check-in
feature.description: Tap button + Seed Vault fingerprint = on-chain transaction recorded with timestamp. Resets at 00:00 UTC daily.
feature.user-value: One tap to stay alive, generates SKR farming activity
feature.business-value: Core engagement loop, creates organic transactions

feature.name: Stake Growth
feature.description: Stake grows 0.1% per successful daily check-in
feature.business-value: Increases stakes over time, bigger deaths = more fees

feature.name: Death Mechanic
feature.description: Miss one day = lose entire stake to pool. 3% goes to protocol, rest distributed.
feature.business-value: Primary revenue source, creates pool for redistribution

feature.name: New User Grace Period
feature.description: Users joining after 11:55pm UTC start their Day 1 next window

feature.name: Bonus Windows
feature.description: Random 15-minute windows throughout day. Tap during window for small boost. No penalty for missing.
feature.user-value: Surprise dopamine hits, extra engagement without stress
feature.business-value: Additional transactions, reason to check app multiple times daily

feature.name: Leaderboard
feature.description: Rankings by streak length and total stake
feature.business-value: Drives retention, screenshot-worthy for social sharing

feature.name: Referral Chain
feature.description: Invite friends, earn 5% of every death in your chain, 3 levels deep
feature.user-value: Passive income from network, reason to invite friends

feature.name: Lifelines from Referrals
feature.description: Every 3 referrals grants 1 Lifeline - a free pass that saves you from one missed day
feature.user-value: Insurance for mistakes, reward for inviting

feature.name: Guardian System
feature.description: Become Guardian for up to 3 people. Get notified if they miss bonus windows, can ping them once per week. Both rewarded if they survive because of you.
feature.user-value: Help friends stay alive, social accountability
feature.business-value: Retention through social bonds, casuals get "carried"

feature.name: Heir System
feature.description: Pick one referral as Heir. If you die, 50% of stake goes to them instead of pool. Unlocks after 7 days alive.
feature.business-value: Stronger referral relationships, 50% still goes to pool

feature.name: Lifeline Purchase
feature.description: Buy emergency lifeline for 0.1 SOL when you have none from referrals

feature.name: Premium Notifications
feature.description: 0.01 SOL/month for all bonus window alerts + "1 hour until deadline" warning. Free tier gets 1 notification/day.
feature.user-value: Never miss a bonus or deadline

feature.name: Home Screen
feature.description: Shows total players, pool size, last death time, and START button for new users OR current streak/stake for active users

feature.name: Streak Display
feature.description: Current day number with fire emoji, stake amount, time until next check-in window
